etymology.description: 儋(儋) is a variant form of 擔(擔) (dān, "carry"); 擔 is phono-semantic with 扌(扌) (shǒu, "hand") as semantic and 詹(詹) (zhān) as phonetic -> "to carry by hand"
etymology.interpretation: 儋(儋) shares the same meaning and components as 擔(擔) (dān, "carry") but differs in structure slightly, emphasizing the action of carrying or balancing a load on one's shoulders or by hand.
